Fried Rare Steak.Description: [Meat] When consumed, HP +10 per second, Max HP +200 for 30 minutes, Satiety +100 and grants enhanced recovery for 10 seconds.

Boiled Egg.Description: Boiled eggs. Consume it to gain HP +100 and Satiety +50.

Mead.Description: [Recreational] When consumed, DMG +6%, stops reducing Max Morale for 30 minutes; Hydration +40, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Tortilla.Description: [Staple Food] Pancake made of corn dough. When consumed, Max Satiety +20, DEF +10 for 20 minutes, Satiety +80.

Fried Pumpkin Ring.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] When consumed, Stamina Recovery +100%, Max Stamina +20 for 30 minutes, Satiety +80.

Seafood Quinoa Rice.Description: [Staple Food] Max Satiety +40, Crit DMG +10%, Body EXP Efficiency +200% for 30 minutes, Satiety +100.

Cooked Meat.Description: [Meat] Roasted fresh meat. When consumed, Satiety +20, Max HP +50; HP +0.5 per second for 5 minutes.

Juice.Description: [Beverage] When consumed, Poison Resist +10, Max Hydration +10 for 20 minutes, Hydration +100, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Smoked Ham.Description: [Meat] Max HP +200, ATK +10 for 30 minutes, Satiety +100 and grants enhanced recovery for 10 seconds.

Roasted Mushroom.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] Breath +1 and Body Poison -0.01 per second, Max Stamina +5 for 10 minutes, Satiety +10.

Cigar.Description: Edible tobacco leaves. When consumed, Crit Resist +10% for 20 minutes; Morale +0.25, Max Morale -0.25 per second for 30 seconds.

Fish Soup.Description: [Meat] Max HP +100, Water Consumption Speed -40% for 20 minutes, Satiety +40, Hydration +40.

Chili Sauce Locusts.Description: [Meat] When consumed, Max HP +100, Satiety Consumption -40% for 20 minutes, Satiety -40.

Roasted Pumpkin.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] Baked pumpkin. When consumed, Stamina Recovery +25%, Max Stamina +5 for 10 minutes, Satiety +40.

Psychedelic Pot.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] Breath +5 and Body Poison -0.05per second, Max Stamina +20 for 30 minutes, Satiety +40, Hydration +60.

Roasted Corn.Description: [Staple Food] Roasted corn. When consumed, Max Satiety +10, DEF +5 for 10 minutes, Satiety +60.

Fruit Kebab.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] Made of fruits and meat. When consumed, Max Stamina +10, Movement Speed +5%, Radiation -1.2 per minute for 20 minutes, Satiety +40, grants enhanced recovery for 10 seconds, and uplifts Mood.

Fried Potato Bun.Description: [Staple Food] When consumed, Max Satiety +40, Max Load +80 for 30 minutes, Satiety +100.

Iced Cocoa.Description: [Beverage] When consumed, Flame Resist +10, Max Hydration +20 for 20 minutes, Hydration +100, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Premium Steak.Description: [Meat] Roasted premium steak. HP +6 per second, Max HP +100 for 10 minutes, Satiety +100 and grants enhanced recovery for 10 seconds.

Sauced Meat.Description: [Meat] When consumed, Max HP +150, Satiety Consumption -50% for 20 minutes, Satiety +80.

Yerba Mate.Description: [Beverage] When consumed, Poison Resist +20, Max Hydration +20 for 30 minutes, Hydration +100, Satiety +20, Radiation -5, and uplifts Mood.

Fish Hotchpotch.Description: [Meat] Max HP +200, Water Consumption Speed -80% for 30 minutes, Satiety +60, Hydration +40.

Quinoa Porridge.Description: [Staple Food] Porridge made of quinoa. When consumed, Max Satiety +20, Crit DMG +5%, Body EXP Efficiency +100% for 20 minutes, Satiety +80, Hydration +20.

Hot Cocoa.Description: [Beverage] When consumed, Chill Resist +10, Max Hydration +10 for 20 minutes, Hydration +100, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Tequila.Description: [Recreational] When consumed, Crit +6%, stops reducing Max Morale for 20 minutes; Hydration +40, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Fruit Wine.Description: [Recreational] When consumed, DMG +3%, stops reducing Max Morale for 20 minutes; Hydration +40, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Mezcal.Description: [Recreational] When consumed, Crit +3%, stops reducing Max Morale for 10 minutes; Hydration +40, Satiety +20, and uplifts Mood.

Fried Taco.Description: [Staple Food] When consumed, Max Satiety +40, DEF +20 for 30 minutes, Satiety +100.

Premium Jerky.Description: [Meat] Max HP +100, ATK +5 for 20 minutes, Satiety +100 and grants enhanced recovery for 10 seconds.

Pumpkin Salad.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] When consumed, Stamina Recovery +50%, Max Stamina +10 for 20 minutes, Satiety +60, and uplifts Mood.

Mushroom Soup.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] When consumed, Breath +2, Body Poison -0.02 per second, Max Stamina +10 for 20 minutes, Satiety +20, Hydration +60.

Roasted Locusts.Description: [Meat] Roasted locust kebabs. When consumed, Max HP +50, Satiety Consumption -20% for 10 minutes, Satiety +10.

Roasted Potato.Description: [Staple Food] Potato cooked in boiling water. When consumed, Max Satiety +20, Max Load +40 for 20 minutes, Satiety +80.

Spicy Soup.Description: [Meat] When consumed, Satiety Consumption -80%, Max HP +200 for 30 minutes, Satiety +100, Hydration +40.

Cooked Potato.Description: [Staple Food] Potato cooked in boiling water. When consumed, Max Satiety +20, Max Load +40 for 20 minutes, Satiety +80.

Mixed Jam.Description: [Fruits & Vegetables] When consumed, Max Stamina +20, Movement Speed +10%, Radiation -3 per minute for 30 minutes, Satiety +60, grants enhanced recovery for 10 seconds, and uplifts Mood.

Chili Sauce.Description: A sauce made of chili and salt.

Broth.Description: [Meat] Max HP +100, Water Consumption Speed -20% for 10 minutes, Satiety +40, Hydration +40.

Bathtub.Description: A large, self-heating bathtub. Nothing is more relaxing than taking a bath after a busy day!

Uncrafting Table Part 2.Description: A modification part of the Uncrafting Table. Used to upgrade the Uncrafting Table to Lv.2 and capable of uncrafting iron gear and weapons.

Cooling Table.Description: Reduces the temperature in an area when the ice melts.

Excavation Pit.Description: Assign a Tribesman to automatically mine ores in the surroundings

Mine Chest.Description: A chest that stores mined ores.

Wooden Door Frame.Description: A door frame made of planks. Press and hold T to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame and sloping wall.

Firefly Wall Lamp.Description: A lamp made of fireflies captured, can be placed anywhere

Iron Pit Bonfire.Description: A large bonfire with an iron pit that provides warmth. People gather around it, and nearby buildings no longer decay. It symbolizes the tribe's mastery of iron casting techniques and the tribe's advancement into the third tier of civilization.

Golden Alpaca.Description: An alpaca-shaped trinket made of gold.

Mammoth Statue.Description: A gigantic statue crafted in the likeness of Mammoth

Power Extension Shaft.Description: Place it properly to connect and transmit windmill power to further locations.

Mine Part 2.Description: A rope made of iron wire.

Brewing Stand Part 3.Description: A modification part of the Brewing Stand. Used to upgrade the Brewing Stand to Lv.3.

Outhouse.Description: Makeshift Outhouse. Someone may be sent to guard it. Used to collect feces.

Portal.Description: A product of civilization that eases migration.

Wooden Ladder.Description: A vertical ladder made of wood.

Building Workshop Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Building Workshop. Used to upgrade the Building Workshop to Lv.1.

Bronze Pit Bonfire.Description: A large bonfire with a bronze pit that provides warmth. People gather around it, and nearby buildings no longer decay. It symbolizes the tribe's mastery of bronze smelting techniques and the tribe's advancement into the second tier of civilization.

Stone Stairs.Description: Stairs made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between stairs, stair angle, half-height stair and half-height stair angle.

Fogfrog Statue.Description: A gigantic statue crafted in the likeness of Fogfrog

Fogfrog Specimen.Description: A specimen made of a Fogfrog's head.

Blackstone Foundation.Description: Foundation made of blackstones. Press and hold Z to switch between a square and a triangular foundation.

Carpenter%27s Table.Description: Used for processing various types of wood.

Uncrafting Table Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Uncrafting Table. Used to upgrade the Uncrafting Table to Lv.1 and capable of uncrafting iron gear and weapons.

Stone Wall.Description: A wall made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame, half wall, sloping wall, and half-height sloping wall.

Wall Torch.Description: A torch that can be mounted on the wall.

Brewing Stand Part 2.Description: A modification part of the Brewing Stand. Used to upgrade the Brewing Stand to Lv.2.

Tempest Griffin Specimen.Description: A specimen made of a Tempest Griffin's head.

Blackstone Wall.Description: A wall made of blackstones. Press and hold Z to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame, half-wall, sloping wall, and half-sloping wall.

Explosive Can Trap.Description: Explosive Can Trap. Detonates a powerful explosive can when triggered. Won't be triggered by allies within the Bonfire's range.

Groundspike.Description: Groundspikes made of timber, mostly used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the bonfire.

Patrol Route Checkpoint.Description: A checkpoint used for signaling and marking routes when guarding the tribe.

Butcher%27s Table.Description: Used for processing various animal products.

Double Chair.Description: A double chair used for players and companions to rest.

Farmland.Description: A common farmland that can be built in the wild or on flooring and can be used to grow various crops in.

Powered Mill.Description: Used for grinding various ores and hard objects quickly. It needs a windmill for power.

Stone Roof.Description: A roof made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between pitched roof, roof, roof corner, recessed roof, gable roof, inverted gable roof, and half-height roofs.

Stone Foundation.Description: Foundation made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between a square and a triangular foundation.

Inscription Plate.Description: An inscription wall plate with text that can be edited freely. Press and hold Z to change sizes.

Thatch Flooring.Description: Flooring made of thatch. Press and hold Z to switch between a regular and a triangular flooring.

Saber-toothed Predator Statue.Description: A gigantic statue crafted in the likeness of Saber-toothed Predator

Steel Storage Cabinet.Description: A storage cabinet made of steel, it is indestructible and has an enormous capacity.

Stone Valve Trap.Description: A valve trap made of stone. One would fall when step on it; mostly used for self-built trap rooms.

Stone Fence.Description: A fence made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between fence, stair guardrail, and half-height guardrail.

Template.Description: Provides heating in a large area.

Wooden Man.Description: A human-shaped wooden dummy that can be used to wear gear for display and training.

Building Workshop.Description: Used for crafting advanced building materials and tables.

Blackstone Gate Frame.Description: A gate frame made of blackstone. Tap and hold T to switch between Gate Frame and Wall.

Blackstone Door.Description: A door made of blackstones. Press and hold Z to switch between single and double doors.

Wall Oil Lamp.Description: An oil-powered wall lamp that can be placed on the wall.

Carpenter%27s Table Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Carpenter's Table. Used to upgrade the Carpenter's Table to Lv.1.

Tempest Griffin Statue.Description: A gigantic statue crafted in the likeness of Tempest Griffin

Medium Trap.Description: A medium trap that is used to capture relatively large animals (such as capybaras, alpacas, llamas, jaguars, and snow leopards); The hunter can take the captured cubs home and raise them.

Thatch Roof.Description: Pitched roof made of thatch. Press and hold Z to switch between pitched roof, roof, roof corner and recessed roof.

Loom.Description: Used for making textiles and ropes.

Collection Yard.Description: Assign a Tribesman to automatically gather bush in the surroundings.

Wild Lion Specimen.Description: A specimen made of an Elite Wild Lion's head.

Beehive.Description: Bees can be kept to produce honey. The optimal temperature for keeping bees is between 10°C to 35°C. After attracting enough bees using bee syrup, honey production will begin without consuming any more syrup.

Distiller.Description: Used for purifying and distilling various items.

Furnace.Description: Used for smelting all kinds of metals with a low melting point.

Grey Wolf Specimen.Description: A specimen made of an Elite Grey Wolf's head.

Wooden Barrier.Description: A wall made of wood. Tap and hold T to switch between Wall and Wall Frame.

Building Workshop Part 2.Description: A modification part of the Building Workshop. Used to upgrade the Building Workshop to Lv.2.

Thatch Door.Description: A door made of thatch. Press and hold Z to switch between single door and double door.

Feed Trough.Description: A trough that stores animal feeds.

Wooden Door.Description: A door made of planks. Press and hold Z to switch between single door and double door.

Sticky Explosive Can.Description: A highly explosive material that can be stuck on various objects. It can deal a great amount of damage to buildings, but lesser damage to living things.

Steel Pit Bonfire.Description: A large bonfire with a steel pit that provides warmth. People gather around it, and nearby buildings no longer decay. It symbolizes the tribe's mastery of steel forging techniques and the tribe's advancement into the fourth tier of civilization.

Powered Refining Furnace.Description: Used for refining and purifying metals. A windmill is required to operate.

Stool.Description: A stool for players and companions to rest.

Steel Roadblock.Description: A steel roadblock that is primarily used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the bonfire.

Jaguar Specimen.Description: A specimen made of an Elite Jaguar's head.

Saber-toothed Predator Specimen.Description: A specimen made of Saber-toothed Predator's head.

Standing Torch.Description: A torch that can be fixed on the ground.

Blackstone Barrier.Description: A wall made of blackstone. Tap and hold T to switch between Wall and Wall Frame

Wooden Flooring.Description: Flooring made of planks. Press and hold Z to switch between a regular and a triangular flooring.

Capybara Pen.Description: Used to breed capybaras. A medium trap is needed to capture young capybaras and bring them back for breeding.

Wooden Foundation.Description: Foundation made of planks. Press and hold Z to switch between a square and a triangular foundation.

Thatch Wall.Description: A wall made of thatch. Press and hold Z to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame and sloping wall.

Brewing Stand.Description: Used for producing potions and medicines.

Blackstone Railing.Description: A fence made of blackstones. Press and hold Z to switch between fence, stair guardrail, and half-height stair guardrail.

Vajra Ape Statue.Description: A gigantic statue crafted in the likeness of Vajra Ape

Decor Table.Description: Used to customize Mask or alter body art painting, hairstyle, etc.

Cooking Stove.Description: Used for processing various food materials.

Stone Gate.Description: A city gate crafted with stone; installed on the gate frame.

Thatch Foundation.Description: Press and hold Z to switch between a square and a triangular foundation.

Arena.Description: A place where your tribesmen can fight with eachother.

Campfire.Description: A common firewood stack, capable of warding off and providing warmth and sustenance. Only a burning campfire can be used for revival. Beware of the rain as it can put out the fire.

Trap Pedal.Description: A trap pedal. Triggers an arrow trap when connected. Won't be triggered by allies within the bonfire's range.

Bed.Description: A simple bed that can be used for resting.

Stone Gate Frame.Description: A gate frame made of stone. Tap and hold T to switch between Gate Frame and Wall.

Earth Kiln.Description: Used for making charcoal, lime, etc.

Sticky Trap.Description: A sticky trap that slows enemies down when they step on it.

Armchair.Description: An armchair used for players and companions to rest.

Distiller Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Weapon Crafting Bench. Used to upgrade the Weapon Crafting Bench to Lv.1.

Statue of God.Description: When war breaks out, timid tribal people seek refuge around the statues of their deities, praying for divine protection, courage, and strength to repel invading enemies.

Alligator Specimen.Description: A specimen made of an Elite Alligator's head.

Stone Flooring.Description: Flooring made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between a regular and a triangular flooring.

Combustion Can Trap.Description: A combustion can trap. Ignites the nearby ground when triggered. Won't be triggered by allies within the Bonfire's range.

Roadblock.Description: Roadblock made of timber, mostly used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the bonfire.

Boar Specimen.Description: A specimen made of an Elite Boar's head.

Small Trap.Description: A small trap that is used to capture small animals (such as young turkeys, parrots, or monkeys).

Standing Firebowl.Description: A supported firebowl that can be placed on the ground.

Stone Door Frame.Description: A door frame made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame, half wall, sloping wall, and half-height sloping wall.

Earth Kiln Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Earth Kiln. Used to upgrade the Earth Kiln to Lv.1.

Pipe Gatherer.Description: A metal tube that can be inserted into certain unchoppable trees to collect sap.

Treehouse Foundation.Description: A foundation that can be built on trees.

Air Heater.Description: Provides heating in a large area.

Powered Spinning Wheel.Description: Designed for fast weaving. It needs a windmill for power.

Ancient Enhance Table.Description: An enhance table left over by the ancient civilization.

Metal Anti-climb Thorns.Description: Metal anti-climb thorns that prevent enemies from climbing. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of bonfire.

Fine Steel Pit Bonfire.Description: A large bonfire with a fine steel pit that provides warmth. People gather around it, and nearby buildings no longer decay. It symbolizes the tribe's mastery of fine steel manufacturing techniques and the tribe's advancement into the fifth tier of civilization.

Turkey Coop.Description: Used to breed turkeys. A small trap is needed to capture young turkeys and bring them back for breeding.

Dining Table.Description: Used to provide food for companions.Store food inside so they pick their most desired food themselves.

Fishing Trap.Description: A simple fishing trap. Automatically captures nearby fish when corresponding baits are added (Baits: locusts, poisonous bugs, meat)

Breeding Farm.Description: Assign a Tribesman to automatically manage the surrounding animal pens (Feed; Water; Collect; Slaughter)

Standing Oil Lamp.Description: An oil-powered standing lamp that can be placed on the floor.

Signboard.Description: A signboard that is inserted into the ground. The text can be edited freely.

Blackstone Roof.Description: A roof made of blackstone. Press and hold Z to switch between pitched roof, roof, roof corner, recessed roof, gable roof, inverted gable roof, and half-height roofs.

Iron Peg Board.Description: A peg board made of iron, mostly used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the bonfire.

Parrot Rack.Description: Used to breed parrots. A small trap is needed to capture young parrots and bring them back for breeding.

Blackstone Valve Trap.Description: A valve trap made of blackstone. One would fall when step on it; mostly used for self-built trap rooms.

Bronze Peg Board.Description: A peg board made of bronze, mostly used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the Bonfire.

Stone Barrier.Description: A wall made of stone. Tap and hold T to switch between Wall and Wall Frame.

Metal Chest.Description: A metal storage chest with a high degree of security. Very hard to break.

Brewing Stand Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Brewing Stand. Used to upgrade the Brewing Stand to Lv.1.

Steel Peg Board.Description: A peg board made of steel, mostly used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the Bonfire.

Logging Yard.Description: Assign a Tribesman to automatically chop trees in the surroundings.

Thatch Box.Description: A simple thatch chest that can be used to store items.

Wooden Gate.Description: A city gate crafted with wood; installed on the gate frame.

Windmill.Description: Allows power conversion via wind power.

Rainwater Collector.Description: A pottery container that is used to collect rainwater.

Bronze Roadblock.Description: A bronze roadblock that is primarily used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the bonfire.

Powered Cutting Machine.Description: Used for cutting and processing various large objects quickly. It needs a windmill for power.

Wooden Chest.Description: A large wooden chest that can accommodate lots of objects.

Black Bear Specimen.Description: A specimen made of an Elite Black Bear's head.

Armor Forging Table Part 3.Description: A modification part of the Armor Forging Table. Used to upgrade the Armor Forging Table to Lv.3.

Power Workshop.Description: It can process various precision parts and requires a windmill to operate.

Hitching Post.Description: A hitching post for parking mounts.

Small Wooden Chest.Description: A small chest that can store some food.

Monkey Storage Nest.Description: A den of the tamed monkey for storing items. Obtained items go right into it by default.

Stone Door.Description: A door made of stone. Press and hold Z to switch between single door and double door.

Double Bed.Description: A comfortable bed that can be used for resting.

Blackstone Gate.Description: A city gate crafted with blackstone; installed on the gate frame.

Archery Target.Description: An archery target that is used for entertainment and shooting practice.

Weapon Crafting Bench Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Weapon Crafting Bench. Used to upgrade the Weapon Crafting Bench to Lv.1.

Wooden Anti-climb Thorns.Description: Wooden Anti-climb Thorns that prevent the enemies from climbing; won't cause damage to allies within the range of bonfire.

Bonfire.Description: A large bonfire that provides warmth. People gather around it, and nearby buildings no longer decay. It symbolizes people settling together, cultivating the land, and advancing into the first tier of civilization.

Armor Forging Table Part 2.Description: A modification part of the Armor Forging Table. Used to upgrade the Armor Forging Table to Lv.2.

Wooden Gate Frame.Description: A gate frame made of wood. Tap and hold T to switch between Gate Frame and Wall.

Granary.Description: Assign a Tribesman to automatically manage the surrounding farmlands (Seed; Fertilize; Water; Harvest)

Carpenter%27s Table Part 3.Description: A modification part of the Carpenter's Table. Used to upgrade the Carpenter's Table to Lv.3.

Wooden Fence.Description: A fence made of planks. Press and hold Z to switch between fence and stair guardrail.

Vajra Ape Specimen.Description: A specimen made of a Vajra Ape's head.

Carpenter%27s Table Part 2.Description: A modification part of the Carpenter's Table. Used to upgrade the Carpenter's Table to Lv.2.

Water Trough.Description: A water trough that stores water for animals.

Oil Lamp.Description: An oil-powered lamp that can be placed anywhere.

Mammoth Specimen.Description: A specimen made of a Mammoth's head.

Arrow Trap.Description: An arrow trap that shoots arrows to harm enemies. Triggered when someone steps on the trap pedal.

Ice Cellar.Description: Utilizing the freezing effect of ice, it can preserve food ingredients at low temperatures to reduce the spoilage speed.

Blackstone Door Frame.Description: A door frame made of black stones. Press and hold Z to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame, half-wall, sloping wall, and half-sloping wall.

Thatch Door Frame.Description: A door frame made of thatch. Press and hold Z to switch between wall, window wall, door frame, double door frame and sloping wall.

Blackstone Flooring.Description: Flooring made of blackstones. Press and hold Z to switch between a regular and a triangular flooring.

Craftsman%27s Bench Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Craftsman's Bench. Used to upgrade the Craftsman's Bench to Lv.1, able to forge metals.

Grass Mat.Description: Used for players and companions to rest.

Armor Forging Table Part 1.Description: A modification part of the Armor Forging Table. Used to upgrade the Armor Forging Table to Lv.1.

Iron Roadblock.Description: A metal roadblock that is primarily used for defense. Won't cause damage to allies within the range of the bonfire.

Hanging Firebowl.Description: A firebowl that can be hung.

Blackstone Stairs.Description: Stairs made of blackstones. Press and hold Z to switch between stairs, stair angles, half-height stairs, and half-height stair angles.

Sticky Incendiary Device.Description: An incendiary device that can be stuck on various objects.

Golden Corn.Description: A corn-shaped trinket made of gold.

Hematogenesis Cream.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers (40%*Max HP +600) HP and 100 Stamina.

Antidote.Description: When consumed, Poison Resist +50 and Poison DMG -20% for 10 minutes.

Blood Essence.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers (60%*Max HP +1000) HP and 150 Stamina.

Stasis Dissipation Soup.Description: When consumed, Hydration +60, Satiety +20, heals internal injuries and a weak mount; Searing Heat DMG -20% for 10 minutes. Additionally, Radiation -0.02 per second.

Premium Poison.Description: A premium poison made of venom after purification. Can be smeared on arrows to make them poisonous.

Refined Bandage.Description: Use it to quickly stop bleeding and recover (2%*Max HP+40) HP every second for 20 seconds, and cure all external injuries.

Splints.Description: Used to cure minor bone injuries.

Herbicide.Description: Used to remove weeds in farmlands.

Anti-Radiation Essence.Description: When consumed, quickly reduces Body Radiation by 50%

Plant Essence.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers 200 HP, cures all minor injuries, severe injuries and necrosis, and removes 60% Poison from the body.

Purified Poison.Description: A poison made of venom after purification. Can be smeared on arrows to make them poisonous.

Coagulation Cream.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers (20%*Max HP +300) HP.

Healing Tisane.Description: Cures latent infections, preventing them from worsening and spreading to others.

Cactus Juice.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers 10 Stamina, detoxifies snake venom and arrow poison, and removes 10% Poison from the body.

Aseptic.Description: A potion that can slow down decay.

Blood Activating Cream.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers (10%*Max HP +150) HP.

Excitant.Description: When consumed, Movement Speed +10%, Frostbite DMG -20% for 10 minutes; Morale +0.5, Max Morale -0.5 per second for 30 seconds.

Locust Pesticide.Description: Used to kill locusts on crops.

Special Healing Tisane.Description: Cures ailments and completely heals the body.

Mysterious Tisane.Description: A potion developed by tribal healers that can remodel the initial physical form and reset the allocation of attribute points.

Premium Bandage.Description: Use it to quickly stop bleeding and recover (1%*Max HP+20) HP every second for 20 seconds, and cure all external injuries.

Mysterious Bodyshaping Pill.Description: A special potion developed by healers from the Mysterious Tribe. Used to remodel physique and reset the allocation of attribute points.

Cactus Essence.Description: When consumed, instantly recovers 40 Stamina, detoxifies snake venom and various arrow poisons, and removes 20% Poison from the body.

Gypsum Bandage.Description: Used to cure minor and severe bone injuries.

Simple Bandage.Description: Use it to quickly stop bleeding and recover 20 HP every second for 20 seconds, and cure all minor external injuries.

Lime.Description: White powder produced from burning stones.

Compound Fertilizer.Description: A multi-function fertilizer made of several fertilizers mixing together. It can boost the growth of crops.

Iron Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting iron ore.

Nitrate Ore.Description: An ore that is rich in saltpetre.

Gypsum.Description: An ore that is rich in gypsum.

Copper Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting copper ore.

Bone Powder Fertilizer.Description: A fertilizer mixed with bone powder that contains a relatively large amount of phosphorous compound.

Calaite.Description: Colorful stones that can be used to make trinkets.

Gold Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting gold ore.

Silver Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting silver ore.

Mineral Oil.Description: A sticky and thick liquid that can be set on fire.

Coking Coal.Description: Charcoal like object formed when coal is processed under a high temperature.

Tin Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting tin ore.

Stone Powder Fertilizer.Description: A fertilizer containing a relatively large amount of nitrogen compound.

Compost.Description: Fertilizer produced by piled branches or feces.

Bronze Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting copper and tin.

Ash Fertilizer.Description: A fertilizer mixed with ash that contains a relatively large amount of potassium compound.

Steel Ingot.Description: A block-shaped metal formed by casting meteorite ore.

Capybara Feed.Description: Plain capybara feed. Capybara's Satiety +100, Growth Efficiency +5%.

Parrot Feed.Description: Plain parrot feed. Parrot's Satiety +100, Growth Efficiency +5%.

Turkey Feed.Description: Plain turkey feed. Turkey Satiety +100, Growth Efficiency +5%.

Refined Turkey Feed.Description: Refined turkey feed. Turkey's Satiety +300, Growth Efficiency +10%.

Alpaca Feed.Description: Plain alpaca feed. Alpaca's Satiety +100, Growth Efficiency +15%.

Refined Parrot Feed.Description: Refined parrot feed. Parrot's Satiety +300, Growth Efficiency +10%.

Refined Alpaca Feed.Description: Refined alpaca feed. Alpaca's Satiety +300, Growth Efficiency +10%.

Refined Ostrich Feed.Description: Refined ostrich feed. Ostrich Satiety +300, Growth Efficiency +10%

Explosive.Description: A compound that explodes when ignited.

Refined Capybara Feed.Description: Refined capybara feed. Capybara's Satiety +300, Growth Efficiency +10%.

Yeast.Description: A substance that speeds up fermentation.

Papaya Seed.Description: Seed of papaya. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires stone powder fertilizer, and a temperature range of 10-40 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 20-30 degrees.

Guava Seed.Description: Seed of guava. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires stone powder fertilizer, and a temperature range of 5-40 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 15-30 degrees.

Corn Seed.Description: Seed of corn. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires bone fertilizer, and a temperature range of 10-40 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 20-30 degrees.

Chili Seed.Description: Seed of chili. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires stone powder fertilizer, and a temperature range of 10-35 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 15-30 degrees.

Pumpkin Seed.Description: Seed of pumpkin. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires ash fertilizer, and a temperature range of 10-40 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 15-30 degrees.

Cashew Seed.Description: Seed of cashew nuts.. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires bone fertilizer, and a temperature range of 15-35 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 25-30 degrees.

Peanut Seed.Description: Seed of peanut. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires bone fertilizer, and a temperature range of 10-40 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 15-30 degrees.

Tomato Seed.Description: Seed of tomato. Can be planted in the farmland. It requires bone fertilizer, and a temperature range of 10-35 degrees to grow, with optimal temperatures at 15-30 degrees.
